name: Don't Lose Your Head (whitedr1)
description:
The headless horseman, upset with his pumpkin head replacement, strikes a deal with Death himself to regain his head! Play as the goofy, clumsy horseman as he makes his way through Death's challenges, balancing his head along the way. Can you make it to the end and be reunited with your head once again?

Team's submission for MSU Spartasoft's Fall 2021 Game Jam. The team is:

Adam Grisdale - Music and Sound Designer

Reid Harry - Programmer/Level Designer

Kalea Vendola - Artist (Horse sprite and animation)

Drew White - Programmer

Drew Cook - Designer/Artist (Cutscenes, select UI elements and obstacles)

Michael Goldman - Artist (Backgrounds, Headless Horseman, select obstacles)
